context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"d7ba54","name":"`video` element visual-only content has audio track alternative","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have an audio alternative.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Brian Bors"]}
